Red.issues: Low nitrogen content and poor water retention
Red.tips: Add organic manure, compost, and green manure crops

Black.issues: Water logging and cracking during dry season
Black.tips: Ensure proper drainage and avoid over-irrigation

Loamy.tips: Maintain soil health with crop rotation and compost

Sandy.issues: Low nutrient and water holding capacity
Sandy.tips: Add organic matter and irrigate frequently

Clay.tips: Improve aeration and add organic matter
